column4: hi, I ve just installed hoary in mi HP laptop, but the function keys doesnt work, I tried xev but gives me nothing
they used to work with warthy
thats a pavillion right?  Have you tried the key setup utility?
fluvell, yes, pavillion, where is that utility? at hp website?
Um, part of hoary... I'll just go look.  I was impressed with hoary, my wireless worked with very little effort
fluvell, mine also, my only problem is this one, i cant adjust brigthness or change the monitor
I'm prob. on the wrong track, I was talking about keyboard shortcuts, where I got my multimedia keys to work on the desktop machine.
so system preferences->keyboard was of no use to you?
Im talking about the fn key, for adjusting brightness, volume, numlock, etc.
ok, my fn key seems to work... I'll just pop over and try a couple of other things
my brightness works, but the blue number keys with (fn) dont
they worked since the  instalation or you did something to make them work?
no, they worked since installation.  Mines a different model though, It's not clear where to look for help on this one
Ill continue searching, thanks for your time
good luck, if you find an answer, post it somewhere searchable
